name: General Checkup
description: A basic health assessment that includes vital signs, medical history review, and general physical examination.

name: X-Ray
description: A diagnostic imaging test used to view bones and detect fractures, infections, or abnormalities.

name: MRI Scan
description: A non-invasive imaging technique that uses magnetic fields to produce detailed images of internal organs and soft tissues.

name: CT Scan
description: An imaging procedure that combines multiple X-ray images to create cross-sectional views of the body.

name: Blood Test
description: A laboratory analysis of blood samples used to assess overall health and detect a wide range of medical conditions.
